name: vcm-virtual-company-manager
description: Virtual Company Manager - Sistema completo para geração e gestão de empresas virtuais com IA

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd vcm-dashboard-real && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.deploy:setup: npm run setup && echo 'Sistema configurado! Execute: npm start'

author: Sergio Castro
